sect2.title: Grep Installation Dependencies
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: as, ld Coreutils: basename, cat, chmod, echo, expr, hostname, install, ls, mkdir, mv, rm, sleep, tr, uname Diffutils: cmp Gawk: gawk GCC: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Gettext: msgfmt, xgettext Glibc: getconf Grep: egrep, fgrep, grep M4: m4 Make: make Sed: sed Texinfo: install-info, makeinfo
